sentences.en: Suggestion unanswering purpose fully what if competitor underbid at sacrifice which quite possible.
sentences.cn: 你方提案目的不明,同行很有可能不惜低价抛售,那该怎么办?

sentences.en: The manufacturers appear to have underbid the contracts by a wider margin than usual.
sentences.cn: 厂家对合同投的标似乎较一般低得太多.

sentences.en: With this pool of slave labor, you can underbid any contractor in the city.
sentences.cn: 有这些可怜的劳工, 你可比这城里的所有承包商出更低的价.

trans.tran_cn: 出较低的价钱，叫价过低，叫牌过低
trans.tran_en: to submit a bid lower than that of (others)
